venue.address_2: about two miles east of Lowe's Store
venue.name: Appalachia Trailhead parking lot

item.description:
This is a weather contingent hike.

http://www.hikesafe.c...

This is a waitlist trip as it is an ADVANCED hike, where I expect you to sign up ONLY if you are:
(1) in great physical shape
(2) have been consistently hiking 4000 footers
(3) can hike the 4500ft elevation gain and maintain book time or faster
(4) own your own White Mtn Guide or know how to research this trip on your own
(5) assume all responsibility for your own safety (http://www.hikesafe.c...)

As other trip leaders have stated (and I will plagiarize...) this is a social hike and I am NOT trained in wilderness safety. I merely want to hike in the company of other strong hikers for safety and fun, while getting some great exercise and enjoying the views.

This meetup can be flexible as I am certainly open to trail variations including a carspot and adding mileage, so don't be shy if you have suggestions.

Again, this is a weather contingent hike. If there is a threat of rain I will postpone this hike for dry weather.
item.name: Mt Adams loop from Appalachia: via Airline and King Ravine
